channel.title: CVE Feed for xchat -- Xchat-WDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for xchat -- Xchat-WDK

item.title: CVE-2012-0828|2024-08-06T18:38:14.795Z -- xchat -- xchat-wdk
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Xchat-WDK before 1499-4 (2012-01-18) xchat 2.8.6 on Maemo architecture could allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (xchat client crash) or execute arbitrary code via a UTF-8 line from server containing characters outside of the Basic Multilingual Plane (BMP).
